title: Can I ask you ????
body:
let me ask about the conditions for participation in trials (FBE), and what sever can register
?

replies.body: You can register to the PBE at anytime through the [application ](https://pbesignup.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/pbe)page.  I don't have a list of servers that are currently accepting PBE applications, but NA is eligible.  I don't have any information on how to get accepted though beyond what's provided on our [PBE FAQ](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201751904-Public-Beta-Environment-FAQ).  Good luck!
